Publications

Publications

Dertwinkel-Kalt, Markus, Holger Gerhardt, Gerhard Riener, Frederik Schwerter, and Louis Strang. 2021. “Concentration Bias in Intertemporal Choice.” The Review of Economic Studies, September, rdab043. https://doi.org/10.1093/restud/rdab043.
Kellner, Christian, David Reinstein, and Gerhard Riener. 2019. “Ex-Ante Commitments to ‘Give If You Win’ Exceed Donations After a Win.” Journal of Public Economics 169 (January): 109–27. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jpubeco.2018.10.009.
Lambarraa, Fatima, and Gerhard Riener. 2015. “On the Norms of Charitable Giving in Islam: Two Field Experiments in Morocco.” Journal of Economic Behavior & Organization 118 (October): 69–84. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jebo.2015.05.006.
Regner, Tobias, and Gerhard Riener. 2012. Voluntary Payments, Privacy and Social Pressure on the Internet: A Natural Field Experiment. 82. DICE. http://hdl.handle.net/10419/68231.
